nodes.text: Around 21 BBY, an unidentified Trandoshan was being held as a criminal in the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center in the Galactic City on Coruscant. He wore an orange colored prison jumpsuit.

This Trandoshan was located in the detention facility's mess hall along with a fellow Rodian prisoner when Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, disguised as the bounty hunter Rako Hardeen, entered the room. He was later seen at the gym with the Rodian, helping him exercise.
Later on, when a prison riot ensued, the Trandoshan fought off the clone guards but was eventually stunned and captured.
